titleStmt.title: William McNeil Clough to James W. Tate
CWG2603

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
"BE PROMPT. ACCURATE AND FAITHFUL. IN THE PERFORMANCE OF ALL ACCEPTED TRUSTS."
WILLIAM MCNEILL CLOUGH
ATTORNEY AT LAW & NOTARY PUBLIC.
PARKVILLE, PLATTE COUNTY, MO.
J. McKittrick & Co. Lithogos. 26 N. Main St. St. Louis, Mo.

COLLECTIONS PROMPTLY ATTENDED TO IN THE COUNTIES OF PLATTE, CLAY, CLINTON, BUCHANAN & JACKSON AS ALSO IN KANSAS TERRIT.
BANKABLE COLLECTIONS CAREFULLY ATTENDED TO AND PROCEEDS REMITTED AT CURRENT RATES OF EXCHANGE.
HE REFERS BY PERMISSION, TO

LUCAS. THOMPSON & CO.,
WOODS. CHRISTY & CO.,
FISKE. KNIGHT & CO.,
CHILD, PRATT & FOX.
E. A. & S. R. FILLEY. } St. Louis

BARNARD & CO.,
LEWIS DORSHEIMER,
SHAPLEIGH, DAY & CO.,
WEBSTER & MARSH & CO.,
MARTIN & BROTHER, } St. Louis

SITER, PRICE & CO.,
WOOD, BACON & CO.,
ABBOTT, JOHNES & CO.,
CONRAD, THOMPSON & CO.,
M. WILLIAMSON & CO., } Philadelphia

NORTHRUP & CO., Bankers, Kansas City, Mo.
SCOTT, KERR & CO., " Leavenworth, K. T.
SMOOT, RUSSELL & CO., " "
GEORGE T. HULSE, " Weston, Mo.
Wm. H. BARKSDALE & COL., " St. Louis, Mo.

James W. Tate Esqr.
Asst. Sec'y. of State,
Frankfort, Ky.
Dear Sir
Herewith enclosed please find my affidavit as Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky, resident in Missouri, as required by Statute, which please file in the proper office. --

Very Resp. Yours etc.
William McNeill Clough
